resources.string: You win! You got the Hunny!

Welcome! How to play:
1. Reach a score of 26 to win with 2 dice rolls
2. Roll with the dice button in the top right corner
3. Don't match 2 of the same numbers or go down 3 branches!
4. Have fun!
Oh No! You got swarmed by bees.\n -3 branches.\n You are at branch: %d
